MySQL query:

UPDATE `wp_worthy_markers` pixel, `wp_posts` p LEFT JOIN `wp_postmeta` pm ON (p.ID=pm.post_id AND pm.meta_key="worthy_counter") LEFT JOIN `wp_postmeta` pmi ON (p.ID=pmi.post_id AND pmi.meta_key="worthy_ignore") LEFT JOIN `wp_postmeta` pml ON (p.`ID`=pml.`post_id` AND pml.`meta_key`="worthy_lyric") SET pixel.`reportable`="1" WHERE pixel.`postid`=p.`ID` AND pixel.`siteid`="1" AND (pmi.`meta_value` IS NULL OR pmi.`meta_value`="0") AND ((pixel.`status`="3" AND (CONVERT(pm.`meta_value`, UNSIGNED INTEGER)>="1800") OR pml.meta_value="1") OR (pixel.`status`="2" AND (CONVERT(pm.`meta_value`, UNSIGNED INTEGER)>="10000")))
